stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements best describes the harmonic and melodic content of measures 1â€“4 of the excerpt above?
choicesHtml: A rising harmonic sequence accompanies a melody that is not strictly sequential.
A rising harmonic sequence accompanies a sequential melodic fragment.
A falling harmonic sequence accompanies a melody that is not strictly sequential.
A harmonically static progression accompanies a sequential melodic fragment.
